text:
OptiMine Software (Saint Paul, MN) - Full time Java Software Engineer. Local candidates (H1B Acceptable)

We are a fast growing Startup in St. Paul looking for a software engineer to join our team and help develop our Internet advertising optimization technology.

We are an agile Java shop using Spring, Hibernate, JSF with an MSSQL backend. We do leverage the Microsoft stack (MS SQL Server, IIS, .NET framework, ASP.NET, ADO.NET, C# or VB.NET, SSIS, SSRS) for ETL and reporting.

http://www.optimine.com/software-engineer/

If you are interested in this position, send me an email dickens [dot] nyabuti [@] optimine [dot] com
